frameset.edef: with the exception of (combined with negation particle)

example.parse:
Never mark the SBJ as it is coreferenced with the particle that is part of the expression.
(S (PRT (FOCUS_PART اما)) (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الوضع) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الميداني)) (NP-LOC (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC داخل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المخيم))) (SBAR (-NONE- *ICH*-3))) (PRT (CONNEC_PART ف)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS بدا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC طبيعياً)) (SBAR-3 (WHNP-4 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (VERB خلا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الاماكن)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC مسرحاً)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN لاشتباكات)))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: the areas where the fightings took place
